'''Redstone Wire Limited'''<ref name=":0">{{Citation|url=https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/07393581|title=REDSTONE WIRE LIMITED overview - Find and update company information - GOV.UK|website={{W|Companies House}}|date=September 30, 2010}}</ref> was the company formed by [[User:Citricsquid|citricsquid]], [[User:Andrewgodwin|aera]] and [[User:WedTM737@legacy41471684|WedTM]] to manage the [[Minecraft Forum]], [[Minecraft Wiki (website)|Minecraft Wiki]], Minecraft Museum and MinecraftServers.com.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20101013142940/http://redstonewire.com/|author=Redstone Wire Limited|title=Redstone Wire, Ltd.}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160407065746/https://rmbls.net/post/16577257153/history-of-minecraftforumnet-and|title=History of minecraftforum.net and minecraftwiki.net|date=January 27, 2012}}</ref> After the acquisition of Minecraft Wiki and Minecraft Forums by Curse on November 15, 2010, the company ceased operations and was officially dissolved on September 6, 2011.<ref name=":0" />
